scripts.build-report: egret build && node script/build.js && node script/report.js
scripts.build-examples: egret build && node script/build.js && cd .. && cd examples && egret clean && cd .. && cd core
scripts.build-test: node script/ShaderGenerate.js && egret build && node script/build.js && cd .. && cd examples && egret clean && cd .. && cd core
